ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery.dnssd
Class TXTUpdate

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery.dnssd.TXTUpdate

public class TXTUpdate
extends Object

DNSSDCall implementation for a DNSSD TXT update call. This call updates the TXT record contents for the local user. Other users browsing in the local area network will receive a notification of the updated TXT record. The TXTUpdate call is currently used for user name changes only.

Note: executing TXTUpdate many times may result in inconsistent TXT record contents at the peer users because the mDNSResponder service uses a cache which will not update very frequently and the service also implements a DOS like security-algorithm for TXT update flooding.

See Also:
DNSSDCall

execute

public Object execute()
               throws DNSSDUnavailable
Executes the DNSSD call. In case of failure, a RetryStrategy determines how many times the call should be retried. If an Error is thrown, is called.

Returns:
Object the value returned by the DNSSD call
Throws:
DNSSDUnavailable - if the call failed
See Also:
RetryStrategy
